modName: Riverwood Ebony And Stalhrim Mine Dragonborn Required
summary: Riverwood Ebony And Stalhrim Mine Dragonborn Required
descriptionHtml:
Dragonborn DLC Required.

This mod adds mine in Riverwood. There is Ebony and Stalhrim veins inside. There is also bedroll so you can sleep and chest for your ore\'s.

Outside there is a guard and she can be use as follower. Look map for location.

Cleaned with TES5Edit. 

- Version 0.3 removed guard factions from guard avoiding any coflicts.
author: Jermu73
